categories.name: Diversity
categories.description: Initiatives related to diversity, equity, inclusion, and civil rights

categories.name: Education
categories.description: Orders specifically addressing educational institutions, pedagogy, and academic programs

categories.name: Environment
categories.description: Climate policy, environmental regulations, and sustainability initiatives

categories.name: Finance
categories.description: Orders affecting financial regulations, funding mechanisms, and economic policy

categories.name: Healthcare
categories.description: Healthcare policy, medical research, and public health directives

categories.name: Immigration
categories.description: Immigration policies affecting international students, scholars, and academic mobility

categories.name: Industry
categories.description: Business relations, economic development, and industry partnerships

categories.name: National Security
categories.description: Security policies, export controls, and sensitive research protections

categories.name: Research
categories.description: Scientific research priorities, research security, and innovation policy

categories.name: Technology
categories.description: Executive orders related to technology policy, digital infrastructure, and tech regulation

impactAreas.name: Research
impactAreas.description: Impacts on research activities and scholarly work

impactAreas.name: Student Aid
impactAreas.description: Financial assistance and support for students

universityImpactAreas.name: Administrative Compliance
universityImpactAreas.description: Compliance requirements, reporting mandates, and regulatory changes affecting university administration

universityImpactAreas.name: Public-Private Partnerships
universityImpactAreas.description: Changes affecting university-industry collaborations, tech transfer, and economic development initiatives

universityImpactAreas.name: Research Funding
universityImpactAreas.description: Impacts on federal research grants, funding priorities, and research administration

universityImpactAreas.name: Research Funding & Science Policy
universityImpactAreas.description: Impact on federal research grants, funding priorities, research security, and national science initiatives across all institution types

universityImpactAreas.name: Student Aid & Higher Education Finance
universityImpactAreas.description: Changes to student financial aid, federal student loans, and university funding mechanisms

universityImpactAreas.name: Workforce & Employment Policy
universityImpactAreas.description: Impacts on faculty, staff employment, labor relations, and workforce diversity

externalSources.name: ACE Policy Briefs
externalSources.description: American Council on Education policy briefs and analysis of executive orders affecting higher education institutions.

externalSources.name: COGR Executive Order Tracker
externalSources.description: The Council on Governmental Relations (COGR) maintains a tracker of executive orders relevant to research institutions. This source provides detailed analysis of EOs affecting higher education research.

externalSources.name: NIH Policy Notices
externalSources.description: National Institutes of Health policy notices, which often contain information about how executive orders affect NIH grants and operations.

externalSources.name: NSF Implementation Pages
externalSources.description: National Science Foundation pages detailing how executive orders are being implemented in grant procedures and requirements.

institutionTypes.name: Baccalaureate Colleges
institutionTypes.description: Institutions where baccalaureate degrees represent at least 50% of all degrees awarded

institutionTypes.name: Community Colleges
institutionTypes.description: Associate's degree-granting institutions with primarily 2-year programs

institutionTypes.name: Master's Universities
institutionTypes.description: Institutions awarding at least 50 master's degrees annually but fewer doctoral degrees

institutionTypes.name: R1 Research Universities
institutionTypes.description: Doctoral universities with very high research activity (annual research expenditures >$100M)

institutionTypes.name: R2 Research Universities
institutionTypes.description: Doctoral universities with high research activity (annual research expenditures $50M-$100M)

institutionTypes.name: Specialized Institutions
institutionTypes.description: Institutions focused on specific fields (medical schools, art schools, etc.)

institutionTypes.name: State-Funded Public
institutionTypes.description: Public institutions with significant state appropriations

institutionTypes.name: Tuition-Dependent Private
institutionTypes.description: Private institutions deriving majority of revenue from tuition

functionalAreas.name: Academic Programs
functionalAreas.description: Functions related to curriculum, instruction, and academic management

functionalAreas.name: Administrative Operations
functionalAreas.description: Functions related to institutional management and daily operations

functionalAreas.name: Diversity Initiatives
functionalAreas.description: Functions related to DEI, civil rights compliance, and inclusion programs

functionalAreas.name: Financial Operations
functionalAreas.description: Functions related to institutional finance, accounting, and budget

functionalAreas.name: International Programs
functionalAreas.description: Functions related to international students, study abroad, and global partnerships

functionalAreas.name: Legal Affairs
functionalAreas.description: Functions related to legal compliance and risk management

functionalAreas.name: Public-Private Partnerships
functionalAreas.description: Functions related to industry collaboration and external partnerships

functionalAreas.name: Regulatory Compliance
functionalAreas.description: Functions related to federal and state regulatory requirements

functionalAreas.name: Research Operations
functionalAreas.description: Functions related to research administration, grants management, and research conduct

functionalAreas.name: Student Aid & Financing
functionalAreas.description: Functions related to financial aid, scholarships, and student financing

functionalAreas.name: Technology Infrastructure
functionalAreas.description: Functions related to IT systems, data management, and digital resources

functionalAreas.name: Workforce & Employment
functionalAreas.description: Functions related to faculty/staff employment, labor relations, and HR
